columns.Institution_id: The unique identifier for each institution.
columns.Institution: The name of the educational institution.
columns.Location: The geographical location of the institution.
columns.Founded: The year the institution was established.
columns.Type: The classification category of the institution.
columns.Enrollment: The total number of students enrolled.
columns.Team: The name of the institution's athletic team.
columns.Primary_Conference: The main athletic conference affiliation of the institution.
columns.building_id: The unique identifier for the building associated with the institution.

Institution.table_description: The table organizes details about educational institutions.

columns.common_name: The common name of the protein source organism.
columns.protein_name: The official name identifying the specific protein.
columns.divergence_from_human_lineage: The degree of genetic divergence from human proteins.
columns.accession_number: The unique identifier for the protein in databases.
columns.sequence_length: The total number of amino acids in the protein sequence.
columns.sequence_identity_to_human_protein: The percentage similarity to the corresponding human protein.
columns.Institution_id: The unique identifier linking to the associated institution.

protein.table_description: The table catalogs various proteins and their characteristics.

columns.building_id: The unique identifier for each building.
columns.Name: The official name of the building.
columns.Street_address: The physical address where the building is located.
columns.Years_as_tallest: The period during which the building was the tallest.
columns.Height_feet: The height of the building measured in feet.
columns.Floors: The total number of floors within the building.

building.table_description: The table records details about various buildings.
